TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComboBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListControl

summary.span: 表示 Windows 组合框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows combo box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示与组合的文本框 ，使用户能够从列表中选择项或输入新值。A displays a text box combined with a , which enables the user to select items from the list or enter a new value. 属性指定是始终显示列表还是显示列表显示在下拉列表中。The property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down. 属性还指定是否可以编辑文本部分。The property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited. 请参阅 了解可用设置及其效果。See for the available settings and their effects. 没有始终显示列表的设置，不允许输入新值。There is no setting to always display the list and disallow entering a new value. 若要显示无法添加新值的列表，请使用 控件。To display a list to which no new values can be added, use a control. 若要在运行时在列表中添加或删除对象，请使用类的方法 (通过 ) 的属性 。To add or remove objects in the list at run time, use methods of the class (through the property of the ). 您可以使用方法分配对象引用数组 。You can assign an array of object references with the method. 然后，列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 可以通过方法添加单个对象 。You can add individual objects with the method. 您可以通过方法删除项， 或通过方法清除整个列表 。You can delete items with the method or clear the entire list with the method. 除了显示和选择功能 外，还提供了一些功能，使您能够有效地将项添加到 和以在列表的项中查找文本。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 使用 和 方法，可以将大量项添加到中， 每次向列表中添加项时都不会重新绘制控件。With the and methods, you can add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 使用 和 方法可以搜索列表中包含特定搜索字符串的项。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. 您可以使用这些属性来管理列表中当前选定的项、 用于指定在编辑字段中显示的字符串的属性、用于 获取或设置当前项的属性，以及 用于获取或设置对对象的引用的属性。You can use these properties to manage the currently selected item in the list, the property to specify the string displayed in the editing field, the property to get or set the current item, and the property to get or set a reference to the object. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 基 Windows 窗体页上有、或，并且想要在派生窗体中修改这些控件的字符串集合，则基窗体中这些控件的字符串集合必须为空。If you have a , , or on a base Windows Forms page and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived form, the string collections of those controls in the base form must be empty. 如果字符串集合不为空，则当您派生其他窗体时，它们将变为只读。If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个完整的应用程序，演示了如何使用 方法将项添加到中，使用方法可以在中 查找项，并提供了 和 方法以有效地将大量项添加到中 。The following code example is a complete application showing how you can use the method to add items to a , the method to find items in a , and the and methods to efficiently add a large number items to a . 用于存储与显示的文本不同的值的功能是从继承的 。The ability to store values that are different from displayed text is inherited from . 有关如何使用此功能的示例，请参阅 类。For an example of how to use this feature, see the class. 若要运行此示例，必须添加对 `System.Drawing` 和 `System.Windows.Forms` 命名空间的引用。You must add references to the `System.Drawing` and `System.Windows.Forms` namespaces to run this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 、 和 属性创建一个 ，它通过将输入的前缀与维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀进行比较来自动完成输入字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这对于 经常输入 url、地址、文件名或命令的控件很有用。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 如果在维护的源中存在重复条目，自动完成功能将无法预测。If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably. 属性的使用 是可选的，但必须将 属性设置为才能 `CustomSource` 使用 。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 您必须同时使用 和 属性。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制它可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. 对于包含正斜杠的字符串 (/) 或反斜杠 (\\) ，自动完成将所有字符追加到，并包括斜杠。For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 、 和 属性创建一个 ，它通过将输入的前缀与维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀进行比较来自动完成输入字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这对于 经常输入 url、地址、文件名或命令的控件很有用。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 如果在维护的源中存在重复条目，自动完成功能将无法预测。If there are duplicate entries in the maintained source, automatic completion behaves unpredictably. 如果将设置 为 ，则列表仅在为或时才显示 。If you set to , the list displays only if is or . 属性的使用 是可选的，但必须将 属性设置为才能 使用 。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to in order to use . 您必须同时使用 和 属性。You must use the and properties together. 如果 将设置为 并 将设置为 ，则此行为如下所示：With set to and set to , the behavior is as follows: - 如果字符串列表为空，则按 BACKSPACE 或 DELETE 键不执行任何操作。If the list of strings is empty, pressing the BACKSPACE or DELETE key does nothing. - 如果在不到一秒内按下 BACKSPACE 键，则选择上一项，或者，如果字符串列表为空，则不选择任何内容。If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in less than one second, the previous item is selected, or nothing is selected if the list of string is empty. - 如果多次按下 BACKSPACE 键，则选择第一项。If the BACKSPACE key is pressed in more than one second, the first item is selected. - 如果按 DELETE 键，则选择第一项。If the DELETE key is pressed, the first item is selected. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制它可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. 对于包含正斜杠的字符串 (/) 或反斜杠 (\\) ，自动完成将所有字符追加到，并包括斜杠。For strings that contain a forward slash (/) or backward slash (\\), automatic completion appends all characters only up to and including the slash.

summary.span: 将各项逐一添加到 时维持性能。

span.span: Maintains performance when items are added to the one at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法阻止控件绘制，直到 调用方法为止。This method prevents the control from painting until the method is called. 向添加项的首选方法 是使用 类的方法 (通过 ) 的属性 。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以一次向列表中添加一组项。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要使用类的方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止 每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表中添加项的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 在将大量项添加到列表中时，这种添加项的方法可能会阻止在绘图期间发生闪烁。This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 方法。The following code example shows the usage of the and methods. 该示例是类概述中的完整代码示例的一部分 。The example is part of a complete code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

summary.span: 在所有者绘制的 的可视方位更改时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由所有者描述的使用 。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 可以使用此事件执行在中绘制项所需的任务 。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果在 绘制项之前将属性设置为) 的值，则 (大小可变的项 `OwnerDrawVariable` ，则 会引发事件。If you have a variable sized item (when the property is set to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value of ), before drawing an item, the event is raised. 可以为事件创建事件处理程序 ，以指定要在事件的事件处理程序中绘制的项的大小 。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过将 属性设置为 `OwnerDrawnVariable` 并处理 和事件来创建所有者描述的组合框 。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn combo box by setting the property to `OwnerDrawnVariable` and handling the and events. 它还演示如何设置 和 属性。It also demonstrates setting the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. `InitializeComboBox`在窗体的构造函数或事件中调用方法 。Call the `InitializeComboBox` method in the form's constructor or event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向添加项的首选方法 是使用 类的方法 (通过 ) 的属性 。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 这使您可以一次向列表中添加一组项。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 但是，如果你想要使用类的方法一次添加一个项 ，则可以使用 方法防止 每次向列表中添加项时重新绘制控件。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成向列表中添加项的任务后，调用 方法以使 能够重绘。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 当向列表中添加大量项时，这种添加项的方法可能会阻止 flickered 的绘制。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 方法。The following code example shows the usage of the and methods. 该示例是类概述中的代码示例的一部分 。The example is part of a code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是要与组合框列表中的项关联的文本进行比较的子字符串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索从文本的开头开始执行部分匹配，并返回列表中与指定的子字符串匹配的第一项。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后，您可以执行任务，如使用方法删除包含搜索文本的项 或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the method or changing the item's text. 找到指定的文本后，如果要在中搜索文本的其他实例 ，则必须使用提供参数的方法的版本来 指定中的起始索引 。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , you must use the version of the method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the . 如果希望搜索完全匹配的单词而不是部分匹配项，请使用 方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 方法和属性的用法 。The following code example shows the usage of the method and property. 该示例是类概述中的完整代码示例的一部分 。The example is part of a complete code example in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是要与组合框列表中的项关联的文本进行比较的子字符串。The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索从文本的开头开始执行部分匹配，并返回列表中与指定的子字符串匹配的第一项。The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后，您可以执行任务，如使用方法删除包含搜索文本的项 或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the method or changing the item's text. 此方法通常在使用未指定起始索引的此方法的版本进行调用之后使用。This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index. 如果在列表中找到了初始项，则此方法通常用于通过在 `startIndex` 搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后指定该项的参数中的索引位置来查找更多的搜索文本实例。Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text. 如果希望搜索完全匹配的单词而不是部分匹配项，请使用 方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. `s`参数是一个字符串，用于比较与组合框列表中的项关联的文本。The `s` parameter is a string to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list. 搜索从文本的开头开始查找匹配项，并返回列表中与指定的子字符串匹配的第一项。The search looks for a match starting from the beginning of the text, returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring. 然后，您可以执行任务，如使用方法删除包含搜索文本的项 或更改项的文本。You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text using the method or changing the item's text. 此方法通常在使用未指定起始索引的此方法的版本进行调用之后使用。This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index. 如果在列表中找到了初始项，则此方法通常用于通过在 `startIndex` 搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后指定该项的参数中的索引位置来查找更多的搜索文本实例。Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text. 如果要执行部分单词搜索而不是完全匹配的单词，请使用 方法。If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the method. 此方法执行的搜索是循环的。The search performed by this method is circular. 尽管搜索从参数后的下一个索引开始 `startIndex` ，但在到达集合的末尾时，搜索将从0重新开始。Although the search starts at the next index after the `startIndex` parameter, the search restarts at 0 when the end of the collection is reached. 但请注意，如果 `startIndex` 参数本身与集合中的最后一个索引相等，则会引发异常。However, note that if the `startIndex` parameter itself is equal to the last index in the collection, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过设置 和 属性并使用 方法搜索来初始化控件 。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a control by setting the and properties and using the methods to search the . 它还显示了如何处理 事件。It also shows handling the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理过程中调用此方法来处理命令键。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 方法必须返回 `true` 以指示它已处理命令键，或 `false` 指示该密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 仅当控件承载于 Windows 窗体应用程序或 ActiveX 控件中时，才会调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法首先确定控件是否具有 ，如果是，则使 能够处理命令键。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果命令键不是菜单快捷方式，并且控件有父级，则将键传递给父级的 方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 最终效果是，命令键在控件层次结构中向上 "冒泡"。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 除了用户按下的键外，密钥数据还指示在同一时间按下键的同时按下了哪个修改键。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 修改键包含 SHIFT、CTRL 和 ALT 键。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性来检索或更改控件中当前选定的文本 。You can use the property to retrieve or change the currently selected text in a control. 但是，你应该注意到，选择会因为用户交互而自动更改。However, you should be aware that the selection can change automatically because of user interaction. 例如，如果在 按钮事件处理程序中检索值 ，则该值将为空字符串。For example, if you retrieve the value in a button event handler, the value will be an empty string. 这是因为当输入焦点从组合框移动到按钮时，将自动清除所选内容。This is because the selection is automatically cleared when the input focus moves from the combo box to the button. 当组合框失去焦点时，选择点移到文本的开头，任何选定的文本都将被取消选择。When the combo box loses focus, the selection point moves to the beginning of the text and any selected text becomes unselected. 在这种情况下，获取 属性将检索空字符串，而设置 属性会将指定的值添加到文本的开头。In this case, getting the property retrieves an empty string, and setting the property adds the specified value to the beginning of the text. 当组合框获得焦点时，将自动选择控件中的完整文本。When the combo box gains focus, the full text in the control is automatically selected. 如果调用控件的 方法来设置输入焦点，则会选择整个文本，而不管控件是否已获得焦点。If you call the control's method to set the input focus, the full text is selected regardless of whether the control already had focus. 当用户从下拉列表中选择某一项或通过使用向上键和向下箭头键时，将自动选择新项的文本。When the user selects an item from the drop-down list or by using the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys, the text for the new item is automatically selected. 但是，如果尝试 在 或事件处理程序中获取值 ，则该属性返回空字符串。However, if you try to get the value in a or event handler, the property returns an empty string. 这是因为，在发生这些事件时，以前的 值已被清除，并且尚未设置新的值。This is because, at the time of these events, the previous value has been cleared and the new value has not yet been set. 若要检索 或事件处理程序中的当前值 ，请改用 属性。To retrieve the current value in a or event handler, use the property instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当用户更改组合框选择时才引发事件，您可以创建此事件的处理程序，以便在 用户更改列表中的选定项时为提供特殊处理。The event is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection, and you can create a handler for this event to provide special handling for the when the user changes the selected item in the list. 但是，根据 配置方式和用户更改所选项目的方式， 可能不会引发事件。However, depending on how the is configured, and how the user changes the selected item, the event may not be raised. 或者，您可以处理 ，但是请注意，无论索引是以编程方式更改还是由用户更改，都会发生此事件。Alternatively, you can handle the , but note that this event occurs whether the index is changed programmatically or by the user. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件和 属性，根据用户选择和提交的内容来更改文本框的长度。The following code example uses the event and the property to change the length of the text box depending on what the user has selected and committed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) 将设置 为-1。Setting the property to `null` or an empty string ("") sets the to -1. 如果将 属性设置为集合中的某个值，则会 将设置 为该项的索引。Setting the property to a value that is in the collection sets the to the index of that item. 将 属性设置为不在集合中的值将保持不 变。Setting the property to a value that is not in the collection leaves the unchanged. 如果不是，则读取属性将返回的文本 `null` 。Reading the property returns the text of , if it is not `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过设置 属性并使用方法填充来初始化控件 。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a control by setting the property and using the method to populate the . 它还演示如何处理 事件。It also demonstrates handling the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeComboBox` 在窗体的构造函数或事件中调用方法 。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeComboBox` method in the form's constructor or event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 事件在实际显示文本之前验证文本。Use the event to validate the text before it is actually shown. 如果 以编程方式更改属性，则不会激发。 is not fired if the property is programmatically changed. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ComboBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ComboBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过方法进行筛选后，所有消息都将发送到 方法 。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅 Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的 [WindowProc 函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85)) 文档。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85)) documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以处理结构中标识的操作系统消息 。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息，以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅位于的平台 SDK 文档参考， 了解可用的 、 和 值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located at to understand the available , , and values. 可以在 "平台 SDK (Core SDK" 部分中包含的 Windows .h 标头文件中找到实际常数值) 下载，也可以在中找到该文件 。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available at . para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的 方法来处理其不处理的所有消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
